title: Human Activity Recognition using Smartphone Data with Machine Learning
description: Human activity recognition is the problem of classifying sequences of data recorded by specialized harnesses or smart phones into known well-defined Human activities.It is a challenging problem as the large number of observations are produced each second, the temporal nature of the observations, and the lack of a clear way to relate data to known movements increase the challenges.In this Machine Learning Project, we will create a model for recognition of  human activity using  the smartphone data.Let’s start with Importing necessary librariesTo Combine both the  data frames#Output((7352, 564), (2947, 564))Test options and evaluation metric
